main event: Military personnel observed a formation of lights over Killeen, Texas on July 7, 1964.
interesting points: The sighting involved multiple military witnesses from Killeen Base., The lights were observed to disappear behind trees after several minutes., No radio or radar contact was reported during the sighting., The lights moved from south to north and were estimated to be around 1000 ft in height., There was absolutely no sound associated with the lights as witnesses stopped to listen.
